channel.title: CVE Feed for NUUO -- NUUO NVRMini2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NUUO -- NUUO NVRMini2

item.title: CVE-2018-1149|2024-09-16T20:42:10.870Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20nvrmini2
item.description: cgi_system in NUUO's NVRMini2 3.8.0 and below allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2018-15716|2024-09-16T17:28:51.627Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20nvrmini2
item.description: NUUO NVRMini2 version 3.9.1 is vulnerable to authenticated remote command injection. An attacker can send crafted requests to upgrade_handle.php to execute OS commands as root.
